name: Sword dodger
description:
This game was made in just TWO HOURS for the F5# Game Jam 1!

Play as a hero stuck in a dungeon as he dodges swords that fly towards him, can you escape? 

SOCIALS 

(1) Spacespy - YouTube
https://discord.gg/peGexyg8jX

Thank you so so much for playing, I really hope you enjoyed! Share your scores down below!

Asset pack by 0x72

Music from incompotech
